alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 9:02AM MST until December 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of 1-3 inches. Snow bands may develop this afternoon and evening, with short periods of intense snow greater than 1 inch per hour. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Bitterroot Valley, Missoula, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will combine with gusty winds to reduce visibility and create hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
